title: Beast Tide Looms · Azure Wolves' First Assault

scenes.description: 画面淡入,展现云雾缭绕的仙域上空,金色卷轴在空中展开,光芒闪动,背景音乐渐起。

visual.composition: Misty immortal skies with a golden scroll unfurling
visual.environment: Immortal realm sky veiled in clouds and golden light
visual.fx: Golden radiance and scroll unfurl effect

scenes.prompt: Xianxia opening, mist-wreathed immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling, spiritual particles drifting, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音,欢迎回来。第7集:兽潮将临·青狼初攻。

scenes.description: 方夫人与金玉宗修士密谈如何借韩立夺取秘宝。

visual.composition: Madam Fang confers in whispers with the Jin Yuzong cultivators on using Han Li to steal the treasure

scenes.prompt: Madam Fang and the Jin Yuzong cultivators whisper about leveraging Han Li to seize the secret treasure.
scenes.narration: 方夫人与秦师兄定下借韩立出城的计划。

scenes.description: 秦师兄承诺事成后帮助潘青结丹,众人笑语掩饰心机。

visual.composition: Senior Brother Qin promises to help Pan Qing form a core once the deed is done while everyone smiles to hide their schemes

scenes.prompt: Senior Brother Qin vows to help Pan Qing form a core after success, their laughter barely masking ulterior motives.
scenes.narration: 秦师兄允诺助潘青冲关,密谋告一段落。

scenes.description: 韩立离开小院,对暗流一无所知,只想着修炼。

visual.composition: Han Li steps out of the small courtyard, oblivious to the undercurrents and focused only on training
visual.character_pose: Han Li walking away from the courtyard

scenes.prompt: Han Li leaves the courtyard, unaware of the scheming and thinking only of cultivation.
scenes.narration: 韩立只觉得闲，回房准备静修，对暗流一无所知。

scenes.description: 张奎宣布任命,韩立凭空举起巨石以示威信。

visual.composition: As Zhang Kui announces the appointment, Han Li hoists a massive stone effortlessly to win trust

scenes.prompt: Zhang Kui proclaims the command and Han Li lifts a huge stone out of thin air to prove himself.
scenes.narration: 护卫们见韩立单臂擎石,立刻闭口服从。

scenes.description: 韩立独居厢房内研究金刚诀第五层,书卷堆满桌案。

visual.composition: Han Li studies the fifth layer of the Vajra Art alone in his chamber, scrolls piled across the desk

scenes.prompt: Han Li pores over the fifth layer of the Vajra Art inside his room, the desk heaped with scrolls.
scenes.narration: 他反覆推演灵气灌体之术,为苦修做准备。

scenes.description: 第三日清晨,韩立悄然走出客栈,独自消失在街巷。

visual.composition: On the third morning Han Li slips out of the inn and vanishes alone into the alleys

scenes.prompt: At dawn on the third day, Han Li quietly leaves the inn and disappears into the streets alone.
scenes.narration: 第三日他无声离城,半日后才悄然返回。

scenes.description: 第七日清晨巨钟齐鸣,震得客栈微微颤动。

visual.composition: On the seventh morning the great bells thunder, making the inn tremble

scenes.prompt: At dawn on the seventh day giant bells erupt, the inn shuddering under the alarm.
scenes.narration: 巨钟与号角齐发,韩立睁眼知兽潮临近。

scenes.description: 西院护卫慌乱披甲,张奎怒声压住喧嚣。

visual.composition: Guards in the west courtyard scramble into armor while Zhang Kui's roar stills the noise

scenes.prompt: In the west courtyard guards rush to don armor until Zhang Kui's shout crushes the commotion.
scenes.narration: 张奎训斥众人,让护卫回屋养精蓄锐。

scenes.description: 街道兽车狂奔,骑士沿途广播戒严命令。

visual.composition: Beast carts thunder through the streets as riders broadcast martial-law orders

scenes.prompt: Beast-drawn carts race down the avenues while riders shout martial law orders to the people.
scenes.narration: 全城戒严令传遍街巷,百姓匆匆躲入宅内。

scenes.description: 城主立于高塔窗口听取情报,神色阴沉。

visual.composition: The city lord stands at the tower window listening to intelligence, face dark and severe
visual.character_pose: Somber city lord at the window

scenes.prompt: The city lord stands at a high tower window hearing the report, expression heavy.
scenes.narration: 城主得知青狼、赤蟒、豹禽三族齐至,愈发忧心。

scenes.description: 韩立与张奎登上南墙,远眺数十里外的青色狼海。

visual.composition: Han Li and Zhang Kui climb the south wall, staring at the turquoise sea of wolves dozens of miles away
visual.character_pose: Han Li and Zhang Kui on the rampart

scenes.prompt: Han Li and Zhang Kui stand atop the south wall, gazing at the blue wolf sea stretching for tens of miles.
scenes.narration: 狼群如青海铺天盖地,韩立首次目睹兽潮阵势。

scenes.description: 张奎提及银狼,韩立心中暗想到昔日银月。

visual.composition: When Zhang Kui mentions the silver wolves, Han Li secretly recalls Silver Moon

scenes.prompt: Zhang Kui speaks of the silver wolves, and Han Li silently thinks of Silver Moon from the past.
scenes.narration: 听闻银狼之名,他心头一震,却只能先放下。

scenes.description: 张奎说明变异兽的危险,韩立估算数量更添凝重。

visual.composition: Zhang Kui describes the danger of mutant beasts while Han Li tallies numbers, growing heavier

scenes.prompt: Zhang Kui details the mutant beasts' threat and Han Li's count only deepens his concern.
scenes.narration: 千匹狼就有一头变异,他暗自估算后也觉棘手。

scenes.description: 二人转至北墙,望见赤蟒海翻滚如血浪。

visual.composition: They shift to the north wall and see the crimson sea of pythons rolling like blood waves

scenes.prompt: They move to the north wall to witness the red python ocean surging like a tide of blood.
scenes.narration: 赤蟒数量更甚,巨蟒盘踞让人背脊发凉。

scenes.description: 回到客栈,征召命令传至,护卫们迅速整装。

visual.composition: Back at the inn, the conscription order arrives and the guards gear up at once

scenes.prompt: Returning to the inn, the summons reaches them and the guards swiftly suit up.
scenes.narration: 命令到达,天东商号全队立刻集结待命。

scenes.description: 天东商号二百余人列队行军,狻狼骑士尤为醒目。

visual.composition: Over two hundred members of the Tiandong caravan march in formation, the suanni wolf riders standing out

scenes.prompt: More than two hundred from the Tiandong caravan march in ranks, the wolf-mounted cavalry strikingly visible.
scenes.narration: 他们穿行城中,引得其他队伍纷纷侧目。

scenes.description: 城墙下的广场上,数万人待命,银甲统领指挥整备。

visual.composition: Tens of thousands await orders on the plaza beneath the walls while a silver-armored commander directs preparations

scenes.prompt: On the square below the walls, tens of thousands stand by as the silver-armored commander orchestrates the formation.
scenes.narration: 广场上军民云集,银甲统领与儒僧商议调度。

scenes.description: 武器与盔甲从龟车上源源卸下,分发给青壮。

visual.composition: Weapons and armor stream off the tortoise carts and are handed to the militia youths

scenes.prompt: Weapons and armor pour off the tortoise carts and are quickly distributed to the able-bodied.
scenes.narration: 龟车上兵器如山,普通青壮匆忙披挂待命。

scenes.description: 狼啸与蟒鸣遥遥传来,空中修士御剑通报前线。

visual.composition: Wolf howls and python cries carry from afar while cultivators on swords relay the news overhead

scenes.prompt: Howls and hisses roll in the distance as airborne cultivators relay alerts atop their swords.
scenes.narration: 铜锣齐鸣,御剑修士高空传声提醒兽群开动。

scenes.description: 青狼开始攀墙,变异巨狼冲入阵列,韩立出手救下指挥官。

visual.composition: Azure wolves scale the walls as a mutant giant wolf crashes into the line and Han Li intervenes

scenes.prompt: Azure wolves swarm up the wall, a mutant giant wolf smashes into the ranks, and Han Li leaps in to save the commander.
scenes.narration: 妖狼突袭指挥官,韩立金光一闪将其退走。

scenes.description: 画面淡出,夜色下的仙城剪影,天空洒落灵光,画面逐渐变暗。

visual.composition: Silhouette of the immortal city beneath nightfall as spiritual lights rain from the sky
visual.environment: Night sky, city outline, drifting spirit motes

scenes.prompt: Xianxia ending, immortal city silhouette under the night sky, spiritual particles descending, calm mysterious mood, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 下一集再见。我是云卷仙音,原著作者忘语。第8集即将开始。
